title: Dia‚Äôs Birthday Celebration
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Dia-chan, Happy New Year~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Happy New Year, Kanata-san. Why are you here in Numazu today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Because~...... I came to celebrate your birthday! Dia-chan, happy birthday~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Oh! Thank you so much, Kanata-san. I‚Äôm very grateful that you came all the way to Numazu to celebrate with me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Fufufu...... I‚Äôm not the only one who came to celebrate with you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>R-Really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah! Come, come, follow me. Everyone is waiting for you to come, Dia-chan~ ùÖ† I put a lot of effort into cooking up a feast for you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, you have my attention. Now I can‚Äôt stop wondering what kind of feast is waiting for me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I made a ton of your favorite green tea-flavored sweets. Kasumi-chan made pudding-flavored bread rolls~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>WOW!!! I‚Äôm going to savor all of it!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
